patthana3.2:213.1: Naadhipatiyā nava, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, navippayutte nava.
patthana3.2:216.1: (Sahajātavāropi paccayavāropi nissayavāropi saṃsaṭṭhavāropi sampayuttavāropi paṭiccavārasadisā vitthāretabbā.)
patthana3.2:220.1: Hetu ceva sahetuko ca akusalo dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.2:221.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava … pe … āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, āhāre tīṇi, indriye jhāne magge tīṇi, sampayutte nava … pe … avigate nava.
patthana3.2:223.1: Hetu ceva sahetuko ca akusalo dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca akusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.2:224.1: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava … pe … noavigate nava.
patthana3.2:227.1: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
patthana3.2:232.1: Hetuñceva sahetukañca abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ceva sahetuko ca abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.2:233.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava … pe … kamme nava, vipāke nava … pe … avigate nava.
patthana3.2:235.1: Hetuñceva sahetukañca abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ceva sahetuko ca abyākato dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā.
patthana3.2:236.1: Naadhipatiyā nava, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, navippayutte nava.
patthana3.2:239.1: (Sahajātavāropi paccayavāropi nissayavāropi saṃsaṭṭhavāropi sampayuttavāropi paṭiccavārasadisā vitthāretabbā.)
patthana3.2:243.1: Hetu ceva sahetuko ca abyākato dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.2:244.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, vipāke nava, āhāre tīṇi, indriye nava, jhāne tīṇi, magge sampayutte nava … pe … avigate nava.
patthana3.2:246.1: Hetu ceva sahetuko ca abyākato dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.2:250.1: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
patthana3.2:257.1: Hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.2:257.2: Hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetusampayutto ceva na ca hetu kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.2:258.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava … pe … avigate nava.
patthana3.2:260.1: Hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca kusalo dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā.
patthana3.2:261.1: Naadhipatiyā nava, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, navippayutte nava.
patthana3.2:264.1: (Sahajātavāropi paccayavāropi nissayavāropi saṃsaṭṭhavāropi sampayuttavāropi paṭiccavārasadisā vitthāretabbā.)
patthana3.2:268.1: Hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca kusalo dhammo hetussa ceva hetusampayuttassa ca kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.2:269.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava … pe … āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, āhāre tīṇi, indriye nava, jhāne tīṇi, magge sampayutte nava … pe … avigate nava.
patthana3.2:271.1: Hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca kusalo dhammo hetussa ceva hetusampayuttassa ca kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.2:275.1: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
patthana3.2:280.1: Hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.2:281.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava … pe … avigate nava.
patthana3.2:283.1: Hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā.
patthana3.2:284.1: Naadhipatiyā nava, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, navippayutte nava.
patthana3.2:287.1: (Sahajātavāropi paccayavāropi nissayavāropi saṃsaṭṭhavāropi sampayuttavāropi paṭiccavārasadisā vitthāretabbā.)
patthana3.2:291.1: Hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca akusalo dhammo hetussa ceva hetusampayuttassa ca akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.2:292.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava … pe … āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, āhāre tīṇi, indriye jhāne magge tīṇi, sampayutte nava … pe … avigate nava.
patthana3.2:294.1: Hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca akusalo dhammo hetussa ceva hetusampayuttassa ca akusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.2:298.1: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
patthana3.2:303.1: Hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.2:304.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava … pe … kamme nava, vipāke nava … pe … avigate nava.
patthana3.2:306.1: Hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca abyākato dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā.
patthana3.2:307.1: Naadhipatiyā nava, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, navippayutte nava.
patthana3.2:310.1: (Sahajātavāropi paccayavāropi nissayavāropi saṃsaṭṭhavāropi sampayuttavāropi paṭiccavārasadisā vitthāretabbā.)
patthana3.2:314.1: Hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca abyākato dhammo hetussa ceva hetusampayuttassa ca abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.2:315.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava … pe … āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, vipāke nava, āhāre tīṇi, indriye nava, jhāne tīṇi, magge sampayutte nava … pe … avigate nava.
patthana3.2:317.1: Hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca abyākato dhammo hetussa ceva hetusampayuttassa ca abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.2:321.1: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
patthana3.2:328.1: Nahetuṃ sahetukaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu sahetuko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.2:329.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ (sabbattha ekaṃ), avigate ekaṃ.
patthana3.2:330.1: Naadhipatiyā ekaṃ, napurejāte ekaṃ … pe … navipāke ekaṃ, navippayutte ekaṃ.
patthana3.2:332.1: Nahetuṃ sahetukaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu sahetuko akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.2:333.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ (sabbattha ekaṃ), avigate ekaṃ.
patthana3.2:333.2: (Hetupaccayo natthi. Pañhāvārepi sabbattha ekaṃ, pañhāvārepi imesaṃ tiṇṇannaṃ hetupaccayo natthi.)
patthana3.2:338.1: Nahetuṃ sahetukaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu sahetuko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.2:338.2: Nahetuṃ sahetukaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ahetuko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.2:338.3: Nahetuṃ sahetukaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu sahetuko abyākato ca nahetu ahetuko abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana3.2:339.1: Nahetuṃ ahetukaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ahetuko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.2:340.1: Nahetuṃ sahetukaṃ abyākatañca nahetuṃ ahetukaṃ abyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu sahetuko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.2:341.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca … pe … purejāte āsevane dve, kamme nava, vipāke nava … pe … avigate nava.
patthana3.2:343.1: Nahetuṃ ahetukaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ahetuko abyākato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
patthana3.2:344.1: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme dve, navipāke pañca, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana3.2:347.1: (Sahajātavāropi paccayavāropi nissayavāropi saṃsaṭṭhavāropi sampayuttavāropi paṭiccavārasadisā vitthāretabbā.)
patthana3.2:351.1: Nahetu sahetuko abyākato dhammo nahetussa sahetukassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.2:352.1: Ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā cattāri, anantare cattāri, samanantare cattāri, sahajāte satta, aññamaññe cha, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte dve, pacchājāte dve, āsevane dve, kamme cattāri, vipāke cattāri, āhāre cattāri, indriye cattāri, jhāne cattāri, magge tīṇi, sampayutte dve, vippayutte tīṇi, atthiyā satta, natthiyā cattāri, vigate cattāri, avigate satta.
patthana3.2:354.1: Nahetu sahetuko abyākato dhammo nahetussa sahetukassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.2:358.1: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
